list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: conformity in the application of something, typically that which is necessary for the sake of logic, accuracy, or fairness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the grading system is to be streamlined to ensure greater consistency
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hệ thống chấm điểm sẽ được sắp xếp hợp lý để đảm bảo tính nhất quán lớn hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the way in which a substance, typically a liquid, holds together; thickness or viscosity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the sauce has the consistency of creamed butter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nước sốt có tính nhất quán của bơ kem
